title: How to force alerts on all text conversations?
content:
I haven't been receiving notifications on some of the text conversations. I'm using Google messenger on Pixel 3 (all updated).

I went to the messenger notification settings and noticed under "Conversation" I have some messages on silent and others on alert. But not all are displayed here. I can change them either to alert or to silent from here. But they continue to stay on this drop down list. Any new message I receive, I might get a notification or I might not.

How do you force the app back to the default settings without losing your conversations? I have over 50.
